questions: What steps are necessary to deploy Tracardi on a production server?
What environment variable must be set to deploy Tracardi on a production server?
What prefix is used for the Elasticsearch indices when deploying Tracardi on a production server?
answer:
## Tracardi production server deployment
To deploy Tracardi on a production server, another copy of the system must be installed and configured with the "
PRODUCTION" environment variable set to "yes." This creates a new set of Elasticsearch indices prefixed with "prod-".
